channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Sweden, The EU And The Race To Innovate
item.description: Sweden’s investment and the EU’s broader strategy indicate that Europe is serious about AI.

item.title: Samsung Project Moohan XR Headset’s 2025 Release Date Confirmed
item.description: A Samsung earnings report has reaffirmed the company intends to release its XR Project Moonhan headset this year, in the second half of 2025.

item.title: Google’s Android Update—Change One Setting To Stop Attacks
item.description: Android is now more like iPhone — here’s why.

item.title: The Prototype: These Bacteria Can Generate Electricity

item.title: Gold House And Nasdaq Convene Power Players To Celebrate The 2025 Gold Power Summit And A100 Honorees

item.title: The biggest thing you bring to the project is forward

item.title: Every tactic…
item.description: Has a strategy behind it. Often unsaid, undiscussed and hidden. It’s easier to simply play with the tactic of the moment. Tell me what your tactic is ...

item.title: Uncomfortable ideas
item.description: The ideas aren’t uncomfortable, we are. You don’t have to like the weather to acknowledge that it’s raining.
